See 'Discovery path' in the glossary section of the=
 user manual. 'P'
is for prerequisites (dns or robots).


> 
> In terms of =
"R", will it affect the link depth of a
> crawling job. For example, if I s=
et the depth
> (max-link-hops) as 8, but I could find the real depth
> migh=
t be 9 or 10, or more in the discovery path of a

e to "Redirection"?

It looks like all on the discovery path gets counted, =
at least if you
are using decidingscope:
http://crawler.archive.org/xref/or=
g/archive/crawler/deciderules/TooManyHopsDecideRule.html#74.
   What scope =
are you using?  Tell us more about your configuration
and please include ex=
amples of overlong discovery paths.
